data.text: @thomasoftea "Blistering mess" is a good turn of phrase.

@thomasoftea I am not expecting this movie is going to be good. I think they're going to get awkwardly stuck pandering to the hardcore nerdfans, while also trying to take the series in new directions to be widely appealing and ultimately please neither.
@thomasoftea They said they're going to stick her in with deleted scenes from TLJ. It's gonna be weird.
